name: Mr. Tomato
overview: Mr. Tomato is a side-scrolling platform game that graphically resembles Bubba 'N' Stix. The main character is a boy trapped in a comic book. The aim is to escape from the comic book filled with a variety of forest animals and deadly traps like spikes, collect diamonds and coins. The game consists of three big stages (forest, village, castle), which can be completed only by collecting all the diamonds and reaching the end of the board before the time runs out. The player may move only to the right, it's not possible return back to the earlier part of the board. The enemies may be jumped over or taken down by throwing tomatoes.
